page.title: 13Children's Playground Games.
page.content: These are some of the games which were seen at playtime in July 1985. {Bulldog}A player stands in the centre of an imaginary pitch.When he shouts "Bulldog"the rest of the players on one side of the pitch run to the other side.The ones who are caught are "on". {Scarecrow Tig}It is just like ordinary tig but when the person "on" tigs someone,they have to stand like a scarecrow.They are free when another player crawls through their legs. {Hop Scotch}There are 8 squares and in order you throw a stone onto the numbered squares.You then hop into each square apart from the one with the stone, up to number 8 then on your way back pick up the stone.You are out if the stone you throw doesn't go in the correct square or if you stand on a line.
